body: yo this manga's hentai is pretty lit

I had a lingering feeling of guilt for reading this manga, and after reading this manga all the way up to this in order (with the brother's monologues and guilt towards his mother becoming more potent), I kind of teared up a little bit. Shit m8 dis da gud shit.

This is a hentai about incest but this isnt only about story between a brother and a sister but also interactions with his other family members like his physical interactions with his inner guilt and his little sister, his guilt towards his mother which makes this hentai so good

I can't read Chinese, but it looks amazing. This looks like what the sexual revolution and freedom should've become for most people. Instead, what  so many men choose was using sex to release hatred, guilt and all sort of emotional baggage, all against women. Most of the porn pages in this site and so many others reveal the true male sexual nature. Exceptions like this one (seemingly) are incredible exceptions.
